ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.assist.des: Enter sentences and see how they will be parsed by Home Assistant. Each line will be processed as an individual sentence. Intents will not be executed on your instance.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.debug.debu: Observe requests to the server and responses from the server in browser console.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.events.des: Send ut ei hending på hendingsbussen
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.actions.de: The actions dev tool allows you to perform any action available in Home Assistant.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.actions.ya: Parameters only available in YAML mode
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.actions.ac: This action accepts a target, for example: `entity_id: light.bed_light`
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.actions.no: The UI does not support templates, you can still use the YAML editor.

No action defined, please define an 'action:' key
Defined action is invalid, please provide an action in the format domain.action
This action requires a target, please define a target 'entity_id', 'device_id', or 'area_id' under 'target:' or 'data:'
This action requires field {key}, which must be provided under 'data:'
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.states.des: Angje gjeldande tilstandsrepresentasjon for ein entitet i Home Assistant.
Hvis entiteten tilhøyrer ein eining, vil det ikkje være noko faktisk kommunikasjon med den eininga.
Malar er viste ved bruk av Jinja2-malmotoren med nokre Home Assistant-spesifikke utvidinga.
Do you want to reset your current template back to the demo template?
Do you want to clear your current template?
Ukjent feil ved framsyning av mal
Denne malen ser på alle tilstandsendringshendingar.
Denne malen ser ikkje på hendingar og kjem ikkje til å oppdaterast automatisk.
Denne malen ser etter dei følgande tilstandendringshendingane:
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.statistics: Statistikkar
Oppføring
Problem
Ingen problem
Eininga til denne oppføringa endra seg frå "{metadata_unit}" til "{state_unit}".
This entity no longer has a state class
Denne oppføringa er ekskludert frå å bli loggført.
Denne oppførigna vert ikkje spora lenger
Denne oppføringa har ingen tilstand tilgjengeleg.
Tilstandsklassa "{state_class}" til denne oppføringa er ikkje støtta.
Delete selected statistics
Delete selected statistics
Løys problemet
Clearing the statistics failed
Clearing not done yet
The clearing of the statistics took longer than expected, it might take longer for the issue to disappear.
Fix all
Info
Fix issue
Fixing this issue is not supported yet.
Entity has no state
''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) has no state at the moment, if this is an orphaned entity, you may want to delete the long term statistics of it from your database.
Do you want to permanently delete the long term statistics of {statistic_id} from your database?
Entity is not recorded
State changes of ''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) are not recorded, therefore, we cannot track long term statistics for it.
You probably excluded this entity, or have just included some entities.
See the recorder documentation for more information.
Entity is no longer recorded
We have generated statistics for ''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) in the past, but state changes of this entity are no longer recorded, therefore, we cannot track long term statistics for it anymore.
You probably excluded this entity, or have just included some entities.
See the recorder documentation for more information.
If you no longer wish to keep the long term statistics recorded in the past, you may delete them now.
The entity no longer has a state class
We have generated statistics for ''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) in the past, but it no longer has a state class, therefore, we cannot track long term statistics for it anymore.
Statistics cannot be generated until this entity has a supported state class.
If the state class was previously provided by an integration, this might be a bug. Please report an issue.
If you previously set the state class yourself, please correct it.
The different state classes and when to use which can be found in the developer documentation.
If the state class has permanently been removed, you may want to delete the long term statistics of it from your database.
Do you want to permanently delete the long term statistics of {statistic_id} from your database?
Eininga til denne oppføringa endra seg
Oppdater dei historiske statistikkverdiane frå "{metadata_unit}" til "{state_unit}"
Slett all gammal statistikkdata for denne oppføringa
How do you want to fix this issue?
The unit of ''{name}'' ({statistic_id}) changed to ''{current_unit}'' which can't be converted to the previously stored unit, ''{previous_unit}''.
If the historic statistic values have a wrong unit, you can update the units of the old values. The values will not be updated.
Elles kan du velje å fjerne alle historiske statistikkverdiar, og starte på nytt.
Juster ein statistikk
Ingen statistikk funne for denne perioden

Nokon gonger ender statistikken opp med å vere feil for eit bestemt tidspunkt. Dette kan øydelegge dei vakre grafane dine! Vel eit tidspunkt nedanfor for å finne den dårlege augeblinken og justere dataa.

ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.yaml.title: YAML
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.yaml.secti: Valider konfigurasjonen dersom du nyleg har gjort endringar, og vil vere sikker på at alt er gyldig.
Nokre delar av Home Assistant kan oppdaterast utan ein omstart. Ved å trykke på oppdater, vil Home Assistant forkaste den gjeldande konfigurasjonen og erstatte den med den nye.
Er du sikker på at du ønsker å stoppe Home Assistant?
Kunne ikkje starte Home Assistant på nytt
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.services.a: Denne tenesta godtek eit mål, for eksempel: `entity_id: light.bed_light`
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.services.d: Teneste-utviklarvertkøya let deg kalle alle tilgjengelege tenester i Home Assistant.
ui.panel.developer-tools.tabs.services.n: Brukargrensesnittet støttar ikkje malar, men du kan bruke YAML-redigeraren.
